name: WayFinder: The Board Game (MVP)
description:
WayFinder:The Board Game,  is a turn based randomly generated space adventure for up to 6 players (4 currently).  Made in 6 days (plus a few files found on the internet and a few assets from a earlier project) for the Godot Wild Jam #23. 

In this early version You can:

* Build the map

* Move around the map (there is at least one path finding bug)

* Hit key events within the map to finish the mission.

In future versions you will be able to attack and be attacked by various combatants and you will be able to use your class specific commands to help aid you in your quest.

If this kind of thing tickles your fancy, let us know in the comments. It will go a long way to making the game better and more enjoyable for everyone!

Thanks again,
